activities: Cicero may at times collect personal data from EU/EEA and/or Switzerland in two known situations.  First, the Cicero website (www.ciceroinc.com) allows visitors to request information about our products and services by entering their name, email address, telephone number and any other optional information.  This information is stored securely at Cicero and is covered by our company's Privacy Policy (www.ciceroinc.com\privacy-policy).  Personal information may also be present in client databases that are shared with Cicero's support team for the purposes of troubleshooting the company's software products.  This information is released to Cicero under existing customer contracts and is also managed under the company's Written Information Security Program as well as the company's Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Germany, Italy, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data does not include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Cicero has a self-regulatory privacy program called the Written Information Security Program, which was created to address regulatory and customer requirements.  This program is managed by an Information Officer, is reviewed annually, and includes employee training to ensure compliance.
